create_third_party.name: Name
create_third_party.required_manager: At least one manager is required
create_third_party.required_valid_url: A valid URL is required. Eg: https://some-resolver.io

update_third_party.name: Name
update_third_party.required_manager: At least one manager is required
update_third_party.required_valid_url: A valid URL is required. Eg: https://some-resolver.io

third_party_created_modal.content: The third party named {name} has been created. It will be displayed in the third party list page.
third_party_created_modal.content_2: NOTE: The graph might take a while to update so the Third Party might take a while before it is displayed

third_party_updated_modal.content: The third party named {name} has been updated. The new values will be displayed in the third party list page.
third_party_updated_modal.content_2: NOTE: The graph might take a while to update so the Third Party might take a while before it is displayed with the updated values
